animeTitle: My Disciples Cultivate, While I Slack Off! Season 2
otherNames: Dizi Xiulian Wo Tang Ping!, Disciples Practice I Lie Flat!, Dìzǐ Xiūliàn Wǒ Tǎng Píng!, My Disciples Cultivate While I Slack Off!, 弟子修炼 我躺平!, 弟子修炼，我躺平！
synopsis: My family was scammed of all its money, and I was about to die and become the shortest-lived elder in the history of the sect… Luckily, my cheat code awakened, and created the Disciple Rebate System, giving my disciples trash pills and returning me the best-quality pills! I’ll revenge first, then riches; I’ll fight against the strongest immortal emperor! A gentle pharmacist, the sexy daughter of an emperor, the one best at the way of the sword… they’re all my disciples!
